## FlowEditorState.getUniformParagraphStyle() method

Gets a uniform paragraph style from the current selection

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getUniformParagraphStyle(diff?: Set<keyof ParagraphStyleProps>): ParagraphStyle;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  diff | Set&lt;keyof [ParagraphStyleProps](./scribing.paragraphstyleprops.md)<!-- -->&gt; | An optional set that is populated with style keys with non-uniform values |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ParagraphStyle](./scribing.paragraphstyle.md)
